contextId.occurrenceNote: This negative statement emphasizes the positive. Alternate translation: "every one is present" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])

This means they are continually pleading to Yahweh or calling to each other. Alternate translation: "they are earnestly praying to Yahweh throughout the entire day" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: they are not silent day or night

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed positively. Alternate translation: "I will spare some of them who are righteous" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: I will not ruin them all

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed positively. Alternate translation: "will burn forever" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
